summary: The diff implements a comprehensive design-focused color scheme update across all portfolio sections. The new color palette features Figma purple (oklch 0.65 0.25 300), Adobe coral (oklch 0.70 0.20 15), and Sketch tangerine (oklch 0.72 0.18 45) colors. The AnimatedBackground component has been replaced with design-related visual elements (wireframe artboards, bounding boxes, alignment guides). All glassmorphism effects, gradients, and UI components have been updated to use the new palette. The CSS configuration properly defines colors in OKLCH color space. The implementation appears complete with consistent application across all sections.
